title: Gender pay gap in Germany in 2017
summary: This chart shows the percentage difference of the Gender Germany in 2017 from 3 European nations .
The 2 largest economies , Germany and the United Kingdom have a similar Germany at just above 20 percentage .
Spain has the lowest percentage in Gender Germany at 15.1 percentage .
gold: The chart shows the gender pay gap , expressed in percentage in three different countries . The UK and Germany have similar gender pay gaps at around 20 % whilst Spain is doing a little better at 15 % .
